column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We went to cafe ba ba reeba while visiting Chicago and someone recommended it to us. All we can say is wow!! This place does get very busy so I would suggest going early. We were able to find a seat at the bar and our bartender was phenomenal. We started with the chorizo date and oh my gosh this was so good. We also got a deviled egg to start. Next we got potatoes with tomato aioli and these were also so good. We then ordered octopus and #61 on the menu. We loved the octopus but were disappointed with #61
column2: it was more of a charcuterie board which we weren't expecting and it took a very long time for it to come out even though nothing was cooked on it. Overall this place is absolutely amazing
column3: we wish there was one back home for us to go to.
